trans-unit.source: Containers are objects that logically contain zero or more components.
trans-unit.target: Contentores são objetos que contêm logicamente zero ou mais componentes.

trans-unit.source: Containers are objects that encapsulate and track zero or more components.
trans-unit.target: Contentores são objetos que encapsulam e controlam zero ou mais componentes.

trans-unit.source: In this context, containment refers to logical containment, not visual containment.
trans-unit.target: Neste contexto, contenção refere-se a contenção lógica, não visual de contenção.

trans-unit.source: You can use components and containers in a variety of scenarios, including scenarios that are both visual and not visual.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar os componentes e contentores numa variedade de cenários, incluindo cenários que são visual e não visual.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> at the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> no final da lista.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added at the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>é adicionada ao fim da lista.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> at the end of the list, and assigns a name to the component.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> no final da lista e atribui um nome para o componente.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added at the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>é adicionada ao fim da lista.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The unique, case-insensitive name to assign to the component.
trans-unit.target: O nome exclusivo, sensível atribuir ao componente.

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> that leaves the component unnamed.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> que deixa o componente sem nome.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the components in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>.
A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects that represents all the components in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objetos que representa todos os componentes do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>.
